FuncDef: The assisted-replication-ip (AR-IP) command defines the IP address that supports the AR-R function in the router. The AR-IP address must also be defined as a loopback address in the base router and advertised in the IGP/BGP so that it is accessible to the remote NVE/PEs in the Overlay network.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the assisted replication IP address.
